mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.title, u.name AS author, p.content, u.profile_photo, p.view_count, p.created_at, p.image_path AS "image", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_likes pl WHERE pl.post_id = p.post_id) AS likes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_comments pc WHERE pc.post_id = p.post_id) AS comments FROM post p JOIN users u ON p.user_no = u.user_no WHERE p.notice_type IS NULL OR p.notice_type != '공지' ORDER BY p.post_id DESC
